commit.message:
re PR c++/62302 (Change in the comdat used for constructors)

	PR c++/62302
	* optimize.c (cdtor_comdat_group): Just look at the
	DECL_ASSEMBLER_NAME of the 'tors.

From-SVN: r214770

files.patch:

+	DECL_ASSEMBLER_NAME of the 'tors.
